author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Rotary Club of Coimbatore Saicity is undertaking Gift of Life and Rastra projects that help in performing heart surgeries for children and rehabilitation and vocational training for persons having spinal cord injury respectively.

Around 770 heart surgeries have been performed and over 30 persons with spinal cord injury have been rehabilitated.

To honour the two successful projects, the club will organise Google Gadothgajan, a comedy play by Crazy Mohan and Maadhu Balaji with Crazy Team at Kikani Higher Secondary School, Coimbatore on January 24, according to a release.

For donor passes, please call 98430 17774 or

98946 44433.
title: Rotary Club organises play today
